entry.title: Tuesday night: Clearing. Low minus 9 except minus 5 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: Clearing early this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 9 except minus 5 along parts of the coast. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Increasing cloudiness. High 6.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness early in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h in the afternoon. High 6. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Showers. Low plus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Showers beginning late in the evening and ending before morning. Clearing before morning. Fog patches developing after midnight. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 20 before morning. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 14 February 2023
